Text: hey, can you help me get this to work? when i unzip the game it says corrupt file. I'm dying to play this!

Try checking the torrent or downloading it again.

You could move the data out of the downloads folder start the torrent again and shift the downloaded data back to make sure the torrent is 100% downloaded. Sometime it will say 100% but it hasn't fully downloaded.
thanks...ill try that now, hope it works i really cant wait to try this game.
@creative_expansion try extract it using 7zX. It's free.
yeah when i unarchive it says archived files are corrupted, im using the unarchiver, should i download a different one?
@locutus90210....your amazing!!!! thank u!! it really worked, im so pumped! thats weird my unarchiver never asked for the password and this one did and it worked, im so grateful thanks a million!
